game.name: SEARCH ALL - BERRIES
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the berries in a large location. The berries will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the berries in a large location. The berries will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places
